reviewText: I only receive one of the movies of the bundle.
I received both of these and have enjoyed them very much.  The price for both could not be beat.  I am very happy to add these to my Blu-ray  collection.

Croods is a fun story about a caveman time family in search of a new safe home.  The characters are hilarious.
Turbo is a fun story about a snail that dreams of racing.  This story shows that if you can dream it, you can achieve it.
These are good kids as well as for adults movies, the digital copy is a real plus for downloading on a tablet.
